articles.author: Nicole Villalpando
articles.title: What to know about Nipah virus: Symptoms, spread and risk in Austin - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Experts explain how Nipah virus spreads, why it’s so deadly, and whether it poses a threat in the U.S., Texas or Austin.
articles.content:
In Asia, the countries in red are where there have been Nipah virus outbreaks. In yellow are the places where the particular bat lives that is spreading the virus.
